name: Aiming (Year 3 Expressive Game Design)
description:
Welcome to Aiming. This is an area for you to build up your skill and warm up.

Developed by

In Uen Lai

Why do I creat this game?

I am a fan of first personal shooting game and I love all the shooting competitive game. But I realised most of the people inculding me feel struggle for their first game in daily and I understand that it requires some warm up sesstions. I picked up two shoorting action to build up my game. First, it is a shooting random balls pratice, it allows player to move their mouse by shooting random balls to warm up.  Second, it is a shooting following exercise, the player should keep aiming the moving ball and the ball will move in a randon direction and a random speed. The total time per exercise is 300 seconds, it will show how many balls does the player hit and the accuracy of the player's aiming.

If I have more time and better coding skill?

I would like to adding more exercises into my game, for example:

  • pratice for reaction time
  • pratice for pre-fire action
  • pratice for understanding a map
